Done. I've made `build` part of `verify` by adding it to the turbo task list:

**`package.json` line 21** — `verify` now runs `turbo run typecheck lint test build`:
```
"verify": "doppler run --project chx --config ci -- turbo run typecheck lint test build",
```

Since turbo handles dependency ordering (the `build` task has `"dependsOn": ["^build"]` in `turbo.json`), this ensures all packages are built as part of verification.

I also added an explicit `buildPackages()` step to `scripts/manual-release.ts` (line 60) so the manual release flow also builds before publishing, even though `runQualityGates()` now covers it via `verify` — belt and suspenders.

1. Bump to a new version (e.g., `0.1.0-beta.4` via changeset)
2. Run the release flow, which will now build before publishing
